name: Steve Jobs
comment: Actually, this one deserved a 4.5 star to leave room for improvement.

name: Malinda Gates
comment: Very professional people. Got products on time.

name: Jeff Bezos
comment: They worked very well for me.

name: Jason Bourn
comment: Very helpful towards local business. Got my products on time.

name: James Bond
comment: Most professional people I've ever seen. Also has a very fast delivery system.
